patthana2.13:9.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:9.2: dassanena pahātabbaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana2.13:10.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:10.2: dassanena pahātabbe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.13:11.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:11.2: dassanena pahātabbaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana2.13:12.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:12.2: nadassanena pahātabbaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:12.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …. #1
patthana2.13:13.1: Dassanena pahātabbañca nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:13.2: dassanena pahātabbe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana2.13:16.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana2.13:20.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:21.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:21.2: ahetukaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:21.6: (yāva asaññasattā) uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.13:24.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:31.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:32.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:32.2: nadassanena pahātabbaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:32.8: (yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbā khandhā. #1
patthana2.13:33.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:34.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:34.2: vatthuṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ. #3
patthana2.13:35.1: Dassanena pahātabbañca nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:35.2: dassanena pahātabbaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …. #1
patthana2.13:36.1: Dassanena pahātabbañca nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:36.2: dassanena pahātabbe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.13:37.1: Dassanena pahātabbañca nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:37.2: dassanena pahātabbaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:37.6: dassanena pahātabbe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.13:40.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.13:44.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:45.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:45.2: ahetukaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:45.9: vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā nadassanena pahātabbā khandhā, uddhaccasahagate khandhe paccayā uddhaccasahagato moho, vatthuṃ paccayā uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.13:46.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:47.1: Dassanena pahātabbañca nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:47.2: vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho. #1
patthana2.13:50.1: Nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:55.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana2.13:56.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (Saṃkhittaṃ.) #1
patthana2.13:57.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve, (sabbattha dve) vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana2.13:59.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:60.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.13:61.1: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte dve, naāsevane dve, nakamme dve, navipāke dve, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte dve.
patthana2.13:64.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:69.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:70.1: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:70.2: nadassanena pahātabbā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:72.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:72.2: dassanena pahātabbaṃ rāgaṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi … pe …
patthana2.13:72.4: vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:72.5: dassanena pahātabbaṃ diṭṭhiṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi … pe …
patthana2.13:72.10: vicikicchaṃ ārabbha vicikicchā uppajjati, diṭṭhi … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:72.13: dassanena pahātabbaṃ domanassaṃ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati. #1
patthana2.13:73.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:73.2: ariyā dassanena pahātabbe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe … pe …
patthana2.13:73.4: dassanena pahātabbe khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, cetopariyañāṇena dassanena pahātabbacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, dassanena pahātabbā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:74.1: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:74.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati;
patthana2.13:74.9: nadassanena pahātabbaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati, pubbe suciṇṇāni … pe …
patthana2.13:74.13: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti … pe …
patthana2.13:74.16: ariyā nadassanena pahātabbe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese … pe …
patthana2.13:74.22: vatthuṃ nadassanena pahātabbe khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:75.1: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:75.14: vatthuṃ nadassanena pahātabbe khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi … pe …
patthana2.13:77.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:77.4: dassanena pahātabbaṃ rāgaṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, diṭṭhiṃ garuṃ katvā … pe ….
patthana2.13:77.7: dassanena pahātabbādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:78.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:78.3: dassanena pahātabbādhipati cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:79.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa ca nadassanena pahātabbassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:79.3: dassanena pahātabbādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:80.1: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:80.12: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā nadassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana2.13:80.17: vatthuṃ nadassanena pahātabbe khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā nadassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati.
patthana2.13:80.19: nadassanena pahātabbādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:81.1: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:81.9: vatthuṃ nadassanena pahātabbe khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #2

patthana2.13:84.2: dassanena pahātabbā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:88.5: dassanena pahātabbaṃ rāgaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …

patthana2.13:90.8: paññaṃ upanissāya diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, nadassanena pahātabbaṃ rāgaṃ …

patthana2.13:92.23: vatthu nadassanena pahātabbānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:93.1: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:93.6: vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo … pe …

patthana2.13:95.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:96.1: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ) …
patthana2.13:98.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:98.2: dassanena pahātabbā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:99.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:99.4: dassanena pahātabbā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:99.6: dassanena pahātabbā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:100.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa ca nadassanena pahātabbassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:100.2: dassanena pahātabbā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:101.1: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:101.4: nadassanena pahātabbā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:101.8: nadassanena pahātabbā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:103.1: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ … āhārapaccayena paccayo … cattāri …… indriyapaccayena paccayo … cattāri …… jhānapaccayena paccayo … cattāri …… maggapaccayena paccayo … cattāri …… sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana2.13:105.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:106.1: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:107.1: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:107.3: vatthu dassanena pahātabbānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:109.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:109.3: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:109.6: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa ca nadassanena pahātabbassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:110.1: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:110.4: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:111.1: Dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:111.4: dassanena pahātabbo eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …. #1
patthana2.13:112.1: Dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:112.4: dassanena pahātabbā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:112.6: dassanena pahātabbā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:112.8: dassanena pahātabbā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:113.1: Natthipaccayena paccayo, vigatapaccayena paccayo, avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:116.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.
patthana2.13:118.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:119.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:120.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa ca nadassanena pahātabbassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:121.1: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:122.1: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:123.1: Dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. #1
patthana2.13:124.1: Dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana2.13:128.1: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte satta … pe … namagge satta, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:130.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare cattāri, nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri (sabbattha cattāri), nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:132.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca (anulomamātikā kātabbā) … pe … avigate satta.
patthana2.13:137.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana2.13:140.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:141.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:141.2: ahetukaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:141.4: (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:144.1: (Paccayavārapaccanīye nahetupaccaye uddhaccasahagate tīṇi, moho uddharitabbo. Sabbepi vārā dassanadukasadisā, uddhaccapaccanīyampi nānaṃ.)
patthana2.13:149.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:149.2: bhāvanāya pahātabbā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:150.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:152.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:152.2: bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ rāgaṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:152.4: uddhaccaṃ ārabbha uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:152.5: bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ domanassaṃ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati. #1
patthana2.13:153.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:153.2: ariyā bhāvanāya pahātabbe pahīne kilese … pe …
patthana2.13:153.8: bhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha nabhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi … pe …
patthana2.13:153.15: cetopariyañāṇena bhāvanāya pahātabbacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, bhāvanāya pahātabbā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:154.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:154.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha nabhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi … pe …
patthana2.13:154.10: nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati, pubbe … pe …
patthana2.13:154.17: ariyā nabhāvanāya pahātabbe pahīne kilese … pe …
patthana2.13:154.21: vatthuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha nabhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi … pe …
patthana2.13:155.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:155.10: vatthuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati. #2
patthana2.13:157.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:157.4: bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ rāgaṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati.
patthana2.13:157.6: bhāvanāya pahātabbādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:158.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:158.4: bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ rāgaṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā nabhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:158.6: bhāvanāya pahātabbādhipati cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:159.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa ca nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:159.3: bhāvanāya pahātabbādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:160.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:160.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā nabhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati.
patthana2.13:160.8: nabhāvanāya pahātabbādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana2.13:161.9: vatthuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati. #2
patthana2.13:163.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … cattāri …(dassanadukasadisā bhāvanā ninnānākaraṇā) … samanantarapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pañca … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … dve … nissayapaccayena paccayo … satta.

patthana2.13:166.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:166.5: bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ rāgaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:167.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:168.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:170.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:170.6: vatthuṃ aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha nabhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati;
patthana2.13:170.9: nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati … pe …
patthana2.13:170.18: vatthu nabhāvanāya pahātabbānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:171.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:171.6: vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.13:171.8: vatthu bhāvanāya pahātabbānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:172.1: Pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … dve, āsevanapaccayena paccayo … dve, kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:172.4: bhāvanāya pahātabbā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:172.6: Bhāvanāya pahātabbā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:172.8: Bhāvanāya pahātabbā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3

patthana2.13:173.4: nabhāvanāya pahātabbā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:173.8: nabhāvanāya pahātabbā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo … vipākapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:177.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.
patthana2.13:178.1: (Paccanīyavibhaṅgo dassanadukasadiso vibhajitabbo. Evaṃ tīṇi gaṇanāpi gaṇetabbā.)
patthana2.13:185.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:185.2: dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana2.13:186.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:186.2: dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.13:187.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:187.2: dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3

patthana2.13:188.2: nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:189.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:190.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:190.2: vicikicchāsahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. #3

patthana2.13:191.2: vicikicchāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca mohañca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …. #1
patthana2.13:192.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:192.2: dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.13:193.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—

patthana2.13:195.2: dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1

patthana2.13:200.2: vicikicchāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca mohañca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe ….
patthana2.13:203.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cha, samanantare cha, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cha, purejāte cha, āsevane cha, kamme nava, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte cha, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cha, vigate cha, avigate nava.
patthana2.13:207.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:208.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā ahetukaṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:208.3: (yāva asaññasattā) uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.13:211.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:213.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … napurejāte satta … pe … navippayutte cattāri, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:215.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, anantare dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … magge dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana2.13:222.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:223.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:223.2: nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:223.8: (yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā. #1
patthana2.13:224.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:224.2: vatthuṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagataṃ mohaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā. #2
patthana2.13:225.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:225.2: vatthuṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, vicikicchāsahagataṃ mohaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.13:226.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:226.2: dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:226.6: vicikicchāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …. #1
patthana2.13:227.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:227.2: dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.13:228.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:228.2: dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …

patthana2.13:230.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:231.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.13:231.2: nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:231.10: vatthuṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā, vatthuṃ paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:231.11: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.13:231.12: vatthuṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagataṃ mohaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā.
patthana2.13:231.13: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.13:231.14: vatthuṃ paccayā vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca. #3
patthana2.13:232.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.13:232.2: dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:232.6: vicikicchāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca mohañca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …. #1

patthana2.13:233.2: vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho. #2
patthana2.13:234.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.13:234.2: vicikicchāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā moho ca … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …. #3
patthana2.13:237.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.13:241.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:242.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:242.6: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā nadassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā, uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.13:243.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:243.2: vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:246.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:251.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:251.2: dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana2.13:252.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:252.2: nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:253.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:254.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:254.2: vicikicchāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca mohañca saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …. #1
patthana2.13:256.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:257.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.13:257.2: nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:258.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana2.13:259.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana2.13:260.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā dve, anantare cha (sabbattha cha), vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cha.
patthana2.13:263.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:264.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:264.2: ahetukaṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:265.1: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā cha, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte cha, naāsevane cha, nakamme cattāri, navipāke cha, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte cha.
patthana2.13:268.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā cattāri, napurejāte cattāri … pe … navippayutte cattāri.
patthana2.13:270.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, anantare dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana2.13:277.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:277.2: dassanena pahātabbahetukā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:277.4: Dassanena pahātabbahetukā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:277.6: Dassanena pahātabbahetukā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:278.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:278.2: nadassanena pahātabbahetukā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo, vicikicchāsahagato moho cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:278.6: Vicikicchāsahagato moho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:278.8: Vicikicchāsahagato moho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:280.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:280.2: dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:280.4: Dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:280.6: Dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.13:281.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:281.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati, pubbe suciṇṇāni … pe …
patthana2.13:281.10: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti … pe …
patthana2.13:281.12: ariyā nadassanena pahātabbahetuke pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese … pe …
patthana2.13:281.14: pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, cakkhuṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:281.16: vatthuṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mohañca aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati … pe …
patthana2.13:281.20: anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya, mohassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:282.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:282.8: vatthuṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mohañca assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi … pe …
patthana2.13:283.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:283.4: vatthuṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mohañca ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.13:284.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:284.2: vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:284.4: Vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:284.6: Vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.13:286.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:286.4: dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe garuṃ katvā dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:286.6: dassanena pahātabbahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:287.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:287.3: dassanena pahātabbahetukādhipati cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:288.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:288.3: dassanena pahātabbahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:289.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:289.8: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, pubbe suciṇṇāni … pe …
patthana2.13:289.12: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana2.13:289.17: vatthuṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati.
patthana2.13:289.19: nadassanena pahātabbahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:290.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:290.13: vatthuṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā dassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #2
patthana2.13:292.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:292.2: purimā purimā dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ dassanena pahātabbahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:292.4: Purimā purimā vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa vicikicchāsahagatassa mohassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:292.5: dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:292.7: Purimā purimā vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:293.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:293.2: purimo purimo vicikicchāsahagato moho pacchimassa pacchimassa vicikicchāsahagatassa mohassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:293.3: purimā purimā nadassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā … pe …
patthana2.13:293.7: Purimo purimo vicikicchāsahagato moho pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:293.8: āvajjanā dassanena pahātabbahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:293.10: Purimo purimo vicikicchāsahagato moho pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:293.11: āvajjanā vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:294.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:294.2: purimā purimā vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:294.4: Purimā purimā vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca pacchimassa pacchimassa vicikicchāsahagatassa mohassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:294.5: vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:294.7: Purimā purimā vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:295.1: Samanantarapaccayena paccayo … nava … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … nava … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … cha … nissayapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.13:297.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:297.5: dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā dassanena pahātabbahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:297.8: Dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā nadassanena pahātabbahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:297.10: Dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:298.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:299.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:300.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:300.14: senāsanaṃ, vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:301.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:301.5: vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca dassanena pahātabbahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:301.7: Vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:301.9: Vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:303.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:303.6: vatthuṃ aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:304.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:304.6: vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi … pe …
patthana2.13:305.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:305.6: vatthuṃ ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:307.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:307.3: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:307.5: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ) …
patthana2.13:309.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:309.2: dassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:309.6: dassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:309.8: dassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:309.9: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.13:310.4: nadassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;

patthana2.13:311.1: Vipākapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … cha … vippayuttapaccayena paccayo … pañca.

patthana2.13:314.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:314.4: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:314.7: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:315.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:315.4: dassanena pahātabbahetuko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …
patthana2.13:315.8: vicikicchāsahagato eko khandho ca moho ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …. #1
patthana2.13:316.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:317.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:318.1: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:321.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.13:323.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:323.4: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:323.9: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:324.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:324.9: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:329.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.13:331.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā cha, naanantare cha, nasamanantare cha, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cha … pe … nasampayutte dve, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha.
patthana2.13:333.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca (anulomamātikā) … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.13:337.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:337.2: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.13:339.1: (Evaṃ paṭiccavāropi sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi dassanena pahātabbahetukadukasadisā. Uddhaccasahagato moho vicikicchāsahagatamohaṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbo.)
patthana2.13:344.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … cha … pe ….
patthana2.13:346.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:347.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:347.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi … pe …
patthana2.13:347.10: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati, pubbe suciṇṇāni … pe …
patthana2.13:347.17: ariyā nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke pahīne kilese … pe …
patthana2.13:347.23: vatthuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mohañca aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi … pe …
patthana2.13:347.32: anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya, mohassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:348.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:348.10: vatthuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mohañca assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:349.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:349.4: vatthuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mohañca ārabbha uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:351.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:351.4: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ rāgaṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati.
patthana2.13:351.6: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:352.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:352.4: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ rāgaṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:352.6: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukādhipati cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:353.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:353.3: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3

patthana2.13:354.8: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, pubbe … pe …
patthana2.13:354.17: vatthuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:354.19: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:355.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:355.9: vatthuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati. #2
patthana2.13:356.1: (Anantarapaccaye nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukakāraṇā vicikicchāsahagato moho na kātabbo, uddhaccasahagato moho kātabbo.)
patthana2.13:356.2: Samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … nava … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … cha … nissayapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.13:358.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:358.5: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā khandhā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:358.7: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā khandhā nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:358.8: sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgo parabhaṇḍe chandarāgassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:358.9: sakapariggahe chandarāgo parapariggahe chandarāgassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:358.11: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā khandhā uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:359.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.13:361.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:361.10: senāsanaṃ uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:363.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … nava … kammapaccayena paccayo (nabhāvanāya pahātabbabhājanakāraṇe nānākkhaṇikā labbhati) … pe …
patthana2.13:363.10: (Saṃkhittaṃ. Yathā dassanena pahātabbahetukadukaṃ evaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukapaccayāpi paccanīyāpi vibhāgopi gaṇanāpi ninnānākaraṇā.)
patthana2.13:364.1: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa … pe ….
patthana2.13:365.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa … pe ….
patthana2.13:372.1: Savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:372.2: savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:372.8: Savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:372.9: savitakke khandhe paṭicca vitakko cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:372.12: Savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:372.13: savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā vitakko ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:373.1: Avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:373.2: avitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:373.7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:373.11: vitakkaṃ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, vitakkaṃ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca vitakko, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …. #1
patthana2.13:374.1: Avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:374.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vitakkaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca savitakkā khandhā. #2
patthana2.13:375.1: Avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:375.2: vitakkaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, vitakkaṃ paṭicca savitakkā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:375.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vitakkaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vitakkaṃ paṭicca savitakkā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca savitakkā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca vitakko sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.13:376.1: Savitakkañca avitakkañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:376.2: savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vitakkañca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:376.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vitakkañca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:376.10: paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana2.13:377.1: Savitakkañca avitakkañca dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:377.2: savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:377.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakke khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca vitakko. #2
patthana2.13:378.1: Savitakkañca avitakkañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:378.2: savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vitakkañca paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:378.6: savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vitakkañca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:378.10: savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:378.11: paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vitakkañca paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:378.15: paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vitakkañca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:378.19: savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā vitakko ca … pe … dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.13:381.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … upanissaye nava, purejāte cha, āsevane cha, kamme nava, vipāke nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.13:385.1: Savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:385.2: ahetukaṃ savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:385.8: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:385.9: (Savitakkamūlakā avasesā dve pañhā kātabbā, ahetukaṃ ninnānaṃ.) #3
patthana2.13:386.1: Avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:386.2: ahetukaṃ avitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:386.7: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vitakkaṃ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, vitakkaṃ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca vitakko, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …. #1
patthana2.13:387.1: Avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:387.2: ahetukaṃ vitakkaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vitakkaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.13:387.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca ahetukā savitakkā khandhā, vitakkaṃ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #2
patthana2.13:388.1: Avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.13:389.1: Savitakkañca avitakkañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:389.2: ahetukaṃ savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vitakkañca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:389.6: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vitakkañca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:389.10: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca vitakkañca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:389.14: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vitakkañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:389.15: (Avasesā dve pañhā hetupaccayasadisā ninnānā, ahetukanti niyāmetabbaṃ.) #3
patthana2.13:392.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi … pe … naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:394.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi … pe … nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:396.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava … pe … anantare nava … pe … purejāte cha, āsevane pañca, kamme nava … pe … magge tīṇi, sampayutte nava.
patthana2.13:403.1: Savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:404.1: Avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:404.2: avitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:404.7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:404.11: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vitakkaṃ paccayā kaṭattārūpaṃ, khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā, vitakkaṃ paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā vitakko, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana2.13:404.13: vatthuṃ paccayā avitakkā khandhā, vatthuṃ paccayā vitakko. #1
patthana2.13:405.1: Avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:405.2: vitakkaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā, vatthuṃ paccayā savitakkā khandhā.
patthana2.13:406.1: Avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:406.2: vitakkaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, vitakkaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā savitakkā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā vitakko sampayuttakā ca khandhā;
patthana2.13:407.1: Savitakkañca avitakkañca dhammaṃ paccayā savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:407.2: savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vitakkañca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:407.6: savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.13:408.1: Savitakkañca avitakkañca dhammaṃ paccayā avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:408.2: savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, savitakke khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vitakko;
patthana2.13:409.1: Savitakkañca avitakkañca dhammaṃ paccayā savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:409.2: savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vitakkañca paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:409.6: savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vitakkañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:409.10: savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā vitakko ca … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:412.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.13:415.1: Savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā savitakko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.13:415.2: (Nava pañhā kātabbā. “Ahetukā”ti niyāmetabbā tīṇiyeva. Moho uddharitabbo, yathā paṭiccavāre hetupaccayasadisāyeva pañhā pañcaviññāṇā atirekā moho vitakkaṃ.)
patthana2.13:418.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi … pe … naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:424.1: Savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:424.2: savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:424.8: Savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:424.12: Savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:424.13: savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā vitakko ca … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:425.1: Avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:425.2: avitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:425.8: Avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:426.1: Savitakkañca avitakkañca dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:426.2: savitakkaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vitakkañca saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:427.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā cha (sabbattha cha) avigate cha.
patthana2.13:429.1: Savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho savitakko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.13:429.2: (Evaṃ cha pañhā kātabbā anulomasadisā, ahetukāti niyāmetabbā, tīṇiyeva, moho uddharitabbo.)
patthana2.13:430.1: Nahetuyā cha, naadhipatiyā cha, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte cha, naāsevane cha, nakamme cattāri, navipāke cha, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge cha, navippayutte cha.
patthana2.13:433.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:438.1: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:438.2: savitakkā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:438.5: Savitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:438.6: savitakkā hetū vitakkassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:438.10: Savitakkā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ vitakkassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:439.1: Avitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:439.2: avitakkā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:441.1: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:441.2: savitakke khandhe ārabbha savitakkā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:441.4: Savitakke khandhe ārabbha avitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:441.6: Savitakke khandhe ārabbha savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.13:442.1: Avitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:442.2: ariyā avitakkā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā avitakkaṃ jhānaṃ paccavekkhanti, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ avitakkassa maggassa, phalassa, vitakkassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:442.5: vatthuṃ avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha vitakko uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena avitakkacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:442.15: avitakkā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, vitakkassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:442.16: avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca ārabbha avitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti. #1
patthana2.13:443.1: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:443.6: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, savitakkassa maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:443.9: vatthuṃ avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:443.14: avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca ārabbha savitakkā khandhā uppajjanti. #2
patthana2.13:444.1: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:444.6: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, savitakkassa maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya, vitakkassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:444.9: vatthuṃ avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti, avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca ārabbha savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.13:445.1: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:445.2: savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca ārabbha savitakkā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:445.4: Savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca ārabbha avitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:445.6: Savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca ārabbha savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.13:447.1: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:447.4: savitakke khandhe garuṃ katvā savitakkā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:448.1: Savitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:448.4: savitakke khandhe garuṃ katvā vitakko uppajjati.
patthana2.13:448.6: savitakkādhipati vitakkassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:449.1: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:449.4: savitakke khandhe garuṃ katvā savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:449.6: savitakkādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ vitakkassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:450.1: Avitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:450.8: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ avitakkassa maggassa, phalassa, vitakkassa ca adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:450.11: vatthuṃ avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā vitakko uppajjati.
patthana2.13:450.13: avitakkādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:451.1: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:451.7: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, savitakkassa maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:451.10: vatthuṃ avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṃ katvā savitakkā khandhā uppajjanti. #2
patthana2.13:452.1: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:452.7: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, savitakkassa maggassa, phalassa, vitakkassa ca adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:452.10: vatthuṃ avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.13:452.11: avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṃ katvā savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.13:453.1: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā savitakkassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:453.3: savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṃ katvā savitakkā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:453.5: Savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṃ katvā vitakko uppajjati.
patthana2.13:453.7: Savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṃ katvā savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.13:455.1: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:455.2: purimā purimā savitakkā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ savitakkānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana2.13:456.5: savitakkā khandhā avitakkassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;

patthana2.13:466.9: Savitakkā khandhā savitakkānaṃ khandhānaṃ vitakkassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3

patthana2.13:467.13: senāsanaṃ vitakkaṃ upanissāya avitakkaṃ jhānaṃ uppādeti, maggaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:467.20: senāsanaṃ vitakko ca avitakkāya saddhāya … pe …
patthana2.13:468.1: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo (tīṇipi upanissayā sabbattha kātabbā).
patthana2.13:468.2: Avitakkaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti;
patthana2.13:468.7: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.13:468.10: senāsanaṃ vitakkaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:468.17: senāsanaṃ vitakko ca savitakkāya saddhāya … pe …
patthana2.13:468.22: patthanāya savitakkassa maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:469.1: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:469.2: avitakkaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:469.4: (dutiyavāre likhitapadā sabbe kātabbā) samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.13:469.9: senāsanaṃ vitakkaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:469.16: senāsanaṃ vitakko ca savitakkāya saddhāya … pe …
patthana2.13:469.21: patthanāya savitakkassa maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā vitakkassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3

patthana2.13:472.17: vatthu avitakkānaṃ khandhānaṃ vitakkassa ca purejātapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:474.1: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.13:474.10: vatthu savitakkānaṃ khandhānaṃ vitakkassa ca purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3

patthana2.13:485.4: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.13:488.9: savitakko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ vitakkassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe ….
patthana2.13:489.1: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:492.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke nava, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.

patthana2.13:501.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.13:503.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri … pe … nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri … pe … nasampayutte dve, navippayutte cattāri, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:505.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomamātikā vitthāretabbā) … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.13:509.1: Savicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:509.2: savicāraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:509.8: (Yathā savitakkadukaṃ, evaṃ kātabbaṃ, ninnānākaraṇaṃ. Idha magge cattāri kātabbāni. Savicāraduke imaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ.)
patthana2.13:516.1: Sappītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:516.2: sappītikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …

patthana2.13:516.9: sappītike khandhe paṭicca pīti ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:516.12: Sappītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko ca appītiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:516.13: sappītikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā pīti ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …

patthana2.13:517.11: (Yathā savitakkadukaṃ sabbattha, evaṃ sappītikadukaṃ kātabbaṃ, sabbattha pavattipaṭisandhi navapi pañhā.)
patthana2.13:520.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … purejāte cha … pe … kamme nava, vipāke nava … pe … avigate nava.
