patthana2.13:525.1: Appītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appītiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:525.2: ahetukaṃ appītikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:525.7: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe appītikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:525.11: (yāva asaññasattāpi) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:525.12: Appītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:525.15: Pītiṃ paṭicca sappītikā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.13:526.1: Sappītikañca appītikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:526.2: ahetukaṃ sappītikaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca pītiñca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe ….
patthana2.13:526.6: Sappītikañca appītikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca appītiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:526.7: ahetuke sappītike khandhe ca pītiñca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, ahetuke sappītike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana2.13:526.8: Sappītikañca appītikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko ca appītiko ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:526.9: ahetukaṃ sappītikaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca pītiñca paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:526.13: ahetukaṃ sappītikaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca pītiñca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:526.17: ahetuke sappītike khandhe ca pītiñca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.13:529.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi … pe … naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:531.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:533.1: Sappītikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana2.13:533.2: (Saṃkhittaṃ. Yathā savitakkaduke anulomapaccayavāraṃ, evaṃ pavattipaṭisandhi nava pañhā paripuṇṇā pīti ninnānākaraṇā.)
patthana2.13:534.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.13:536.1: Sappītikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sappītiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:537.1: Appītikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā appītiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.13:537.5: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā appītikā khandhā pīti ca, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:537.6: (Anulomasadisā nava pañhā, pavattiyeva paṭisandhi natthi, ekoyeva moho.)
patthana2.13:538.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi … pe … naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme nava, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:541.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:544.1: Sappītikaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe … hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha (sabbattha cha), avigate cha.
patthana2.13:546.1: Nahetuyā cha, naadhipatiyā cha, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte cha, naāsevane cha, nakamme cattāri, navipāke cha, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge cha, navippayutte cha.
patthana2.13:549.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:554.1: Sappītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:554.2: sappītikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:554.5: Sappītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:554.6: sappītikā hetū pītiyā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:554.10: Sappītikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ pītiyā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:555.1: Appītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:555.2: appītikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:557.1: Sappītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:557.2: sappītike khandhe ārabbha sappītikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:557.4: Sappītike khandhe ārabbha appītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:557.6: Sappītike khandhe ārabbha sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.13:558.1: Appītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:558.2: appītikena cittena dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:558.4: uposathakammaṃ katvā appītikena cittena paccavekkhati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha appītiko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:558.9: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā appītikena cittena phalaṃ paccavekkhati, ariyā appītikena cittena nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ appītikassa gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya pītiyā ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:558.10: ariyā appītikena cittena appītike pahīne kilese … pe …
patthana2.13:558.18: vatthuṃ appītike khandhe ca pītiñca appītikena cittena aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha appītiko rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:558.26: appītikā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya pītiyā ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:558.27: appītike khandhe ca pītiñca ārabbha appītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti. #1
patthana2.13:559.1: Appītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:559.2: appītikena cittena dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:559.6: sappītikena cittena paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha sappītiko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.13:559.11: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā sappītikena cittena phalaṃ paccavekkhati, ariyā sappītikena cittena nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ sappītikassa gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:559.12: ariyā sappītikena cittena appītike pahīne kilese … pe …
patthana2.13:559.20: vatthuṃ appītike khandhe ca pītiñca sappītikena cittena aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha sappītiko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.13:559.23: appītike khandhe ca pītiñca ārabbha sappītikā khandhā uppajjanti. #2
patthana2.13:560.1: Appītiko dhammo sappītikassa ca appītikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:560.2: appītikena cittena dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:560.6: sappītikena cittena paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti, appītikā jhānā … pe …
patthana2.13:560.10: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā sappītikena cittena phalaṃ paccavekkhati, ariyā sappītikena cittena nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ sappītikassa gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, pītiyā ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:560.11: ariyā sappītikena cittena appītike pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese … pe …
patthana2.13:560.17: vatthuṃ appītike khandhe ca pītiñca sappītikena cittena aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti, appītike khandhe ca pītiñca ārabbha sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.13:561.1: Sappītiko ca appītiko ca dhammā sappītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:561.2: sappītike khandhe ca pītiñca ārabbha sappītikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:561.4: Sappītike khandhe ca pītiñca ārabbha appītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:562.2: Sappītike khandhe ca pītiñca ārabbha sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.13:564.1: Sappītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:564.4: sappītike khandhe garuṃ katvā sappītikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:565.1: Sappītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:565.4: sappītike khandhe garuṃ katvā appītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:565.6: sappītikādhipati pītiyā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:566.1: Sappītiko dhammo sappītikassa ca appītikassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:566.4: sappītike khandhe garuṃ katvā sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:566.6: sappītikādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ pītiyā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:567.1: Appītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:567.10: appītikena cittena taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā appītiko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.13:567.15: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā appītikena cittena phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati;
patthana2.13:567.16: ariyā appītikena cittena nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ appītikassa gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:567.19: vatthuṃ appītike khandhe ca pītiñca appītikena cittena garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā appītiko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, appītike khandhe ca pītiñca garuṃ katvā appītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:567.21: appītikādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:568.1: Appītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:568.9: (saṃkhittaṃ) nibbānaṃ sappītikassa gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:568.12: vatthuṃ appītike khandhe ca pītiñca sappītikena cittena garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā sappītiko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.13:568.13: appītike khandhe ca pītiñca garuṃ katvā sappītikā khandhā uppajjanti. #2
patthana2.13:569.1: Appītiko dhammo sappītikassa ca appītikassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:569.5: (saṃkhittaṃ) nibbānaṃ sappītikassa gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, pītiyā ca adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:569.8: vatthuṃ appītike khandhe ca pītiñca sappītikena cittena garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati appītike khandhe ca pītiñca garuṃ katvā sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.13:570.1: Sappītiko ca appītiko ca dhammā sappītikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:570.3: sappītike khandhe ca pītiñca garuṃ katvā sappītikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:570.5: Sappītike khandhe ca pītiñca garuṃ katvā appītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:570.7: Sappītike khandhe ca pītiñca garuṃ katvā sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.13:572.1: Sappītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:572.2: purimā purimā sappītikā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sappītikānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:572.4: Purimā purimā sappītikā khandhā pacchimāya pacchimāya pītiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:572.5: sappītikaṃ cuticittaṃ appītikassa upapatticittassa, sappītikaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ āvajjanāya, sappītikā khandhā appītikassa vuṭṭhānassa, pītisahagatā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuyā, sappītikaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ appītikassa bhavaṅgassa, sappītikaṃ kusalākusalaṃ appītikassa vuṭṭhānassa, kiriyaṃ vuṭṭhānassa, phalaṃ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:572.7: Purimā purimā sappītikā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sappītikānaṃ khandhānaṃ pītiyā ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:573.1: Appītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:573.2: purimā purimā pīti pacchimāya pacchimāya pītiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:573.3: purimā purimā appītikā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ appītikānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:573.6: appītikāya phalasamāpattiyā pītiyā ca anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:573.8: Purimā purimā pīti pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sappītikānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:573.9: appītikaṃ cuticittaṃ sappītikassa upapatticittassa, āvajjanā sappītikānaṃ khandhānaṃ, appītikā khandhā sappītikassa vuṭṭhānassa, vipākamanodhātu sappītikāya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā, appītikaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ sappītikassa bhavaṅgassa, appītikaṃ kusalākusalaṃ sappītikassa vuṭṭhānassa, kiriyaṃ vuṭṭhānassa, phalaṃ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:573.10: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ sappītikāya phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:574.1: Appītiko dhammo sappītikassa ca appītikassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:574.2: purimā purimā pīti pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sappītikānaṃ khandhānaṃ pītiyā ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:575.1: Sappītiko ca appītiko ca dhammā sappītikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:575.2: purimā purimā sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sappītikānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:576.1: Sappītiko ca appītiko ca dhammā appītikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:576.2: purimā purimā sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca pacchimāya pacchimāya pītiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:576.3: sappītikaṃ cuticittañca pīti ca appītikassa upapatticittassa …
patthana2.13:576.5: sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca appītikassa vuṭṭhānassa …
patthana2.13:576.6: sappītikā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu ca pīti ca kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuyā …
patthana2.13:576.7: sappītikaṃ bhavaṅgañca pīti ca appītikassa bhavaṅgassa …
patthana2.13:576.8: sappītikaṃ kusalākusalañca pīti ca appītikassa vuṭṭhānassa …
patthana2.13:576.10: phalañca pīti ca vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:577.1: Sappītiko ca appītiko ca dhammā sappītikassa ca appītikassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:577.2: purimā purimā sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sappītikānaṃ khandhānaṃ pītiyā ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:578.1: Samanantarapaccayena paccayo … nava … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … nava … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nava … nissayapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.13:580.1: Sappītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:580.5: sappītikā khandhā sappītikānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:580.7: Sappītikā khandhā appītikānaṃ khandhānaṃ pītiyā ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:580.9: Sappītikā khandhā sappītikānaṃ khandhānaṃ pītiyā ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:581.1: Appītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:581.5: appītikaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya appītikena cittena dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti;
patthana2.13:581.11: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.13:581.26: pītiṃ upanissāya appītikena cittena dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:581.33: senāsanaṃ pīti ca appītikāya saddhāya … pe …
patthana2.13:581.38: maggassa phalasamāpattiyā pītiyā ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:582.1: Appītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:582.3: Appītikaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya sappītikena cittena dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:582.10: senāsanaṃ pītiṃ upanissāya sappītikena cittena dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:582.13: sappītikena cittena adinnaṃ ādiyati, musā … pe …
patthana2.13:582.34: senāsanaṃ pīti ca sappītikāya saddhāya … pe …
patthana2.13:583.1: Appītiko dhammo sappītikassa ca appītikassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo (tīṇi upanissayā).
patthana2.13:583.2: Appītikaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya sappītikena cittena dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:583.4: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.13:583.7: senāsanaṃ pītiṃ upanissāya sappītikena cittena dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:583.15: senāsanaṃ pīti ca sappītikāya saddhāya … pe …
patthana2.13:583.23: maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā pītiyā ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:584.1: Sappītiko ca appītiko ca dhammā sappītikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo (tīṇipi upanissayā).
patthana2.13:584.2: Sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca sappītikānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:584.4: Sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca appītikānaṃ khandhānaṃ pītiyā ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:584.6: Sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca sappītikānaṃ khandhānaṃ pītiyā ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:586.1: Appītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:586.6: vatthuṃ appītikena cittena aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha appītiko rāgo … pe …
patthana2.13:586.10: domanassaṃ uppajjati, pīti uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati … pe …
patthana2.13:586.19: vatthu appītikānaṃ khandhānaṃ pītiyā ca purejātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:587.1: Appītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:587.6: vatthuṃ sappītikena cittena aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha sappītiko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:588.1: Appītiko dhammo sappītikassa ca appītikassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:588.6: vatthuṃ sappītikena cittena aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha pīti ca sampayuttakā khandhā ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:588.10: vatthu sappītikānaṃ khandhānaṃ pītiyā ca purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:590.1: Sappītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … nava … kammapaccayena paccayo … cha (sahajātāpi nānākkhaṇikāpi kātabbā … dve nānākkhaṇikā) …
patthana2.13:590.8: vipākapaccayena paccayo … nava … āhārapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … indriyapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … jhānapaccayena paccayo … nava … maggapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … cha … vippayuttapaccayena paccayo … pañca … atthipaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.13:590.27: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.13:594.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cha, vipāke nava, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne nava, magge cattāri, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.13:597.1: Sappītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:597.5: Sappītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:597.10: Sappītiko dhammo sappītikassa ca appītikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:598.1: Appītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:598.9: Appītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:598.13: Appītiko dhammo sappītikassa ca appītikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:599.1: Sappītiko ca appītiko ca dhammā sappītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:599.4: Sappītiko ca appītiko ca dhammā appītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:599.8: Sappītiko ca appītiko ca dhammā sappītikassa ca appītikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:600.1: (Paccanīyavibhaṅgagaṇanāpi savitakkadukasadisā. Yadipi na sameti imaṃ anulomaṃ paccavekkhitvā gaṇetabbaṃ, itare dve gaṇanā gaṇetabbā.)
patthana2.13:604.1: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:604.2: pītisahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:604.6: (evaṃ pītisahagatadukaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ, sappītikadukasadisaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ, āmasanaṃ ninnānaṃ.)
patthana2.13:610.1: Sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:610.2: sukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho;
patthana2.13:610.5: Sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:610.6: sukhasahagate khandhe paṭicca sukhaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
patthana2.13:611.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … purejāte cha, āsevane cha, kamme nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.13:613.1: Sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:613.2: ahetukaṃ sukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:613.5: Ahetuke sukhasahagate khandhe paṭicca sukhañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
patthana2.13:613.6: Sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato ca nasukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:613.7: ahetukaṃ sukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā sukhañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana2.13:614.1: Nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:614.2: ahetukaṃ nasukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:614.7: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe nasukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:614.11: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe ….
patthana2.13:614.13: (Yāva asaññasattā) Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:614.14: (Yathā sappītike nahetupaccayasadisaṃ, ninnānaṃ sabbatthameva nava pañhā.)
patthana2.13:615.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne cha, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:617.1: (Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā. Paccayavāre pavattipi paṭisandhipi vitthāretabbā, yathā sappītikadukapaccayavārapaccanīyepi pavatte vatthu ca vitthāretabbaṃ, yathā sappītikaduke ekoyeva moho, evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi yathā sappītikadukaṃ, evaṃ kātabbaṃ.)
patthana2.13:622.1: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … cattāri.
patthana2.13:624.1: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:624.2: purimā purimā sukhasahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sukhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:624.4: Purimā purimā sukhasahagatā khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa sukhassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:624.14: Purimā purimā sukhasahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sukhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ sukhassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:625.1: Nasukhasahagato dhammo nasukhasahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:626.1: Sukhasahagato ca nasukhasahagato ca dhammā sukhasahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:626.2: purimā purimā sukhasahagatā khandhā ca sukhañca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sukhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:626.4: Purimā purimā sukhasahagatā khandhā ca sukhañca pacchimassa pacchimassa sukhassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:626.14: Purimā purimā sukhasahagatā khandhā ca sukhañca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sukhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ sukhassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:627.1: Samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:629.1: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:630.1: Nasukhasahagato dhammo nasukhasahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:630.5: nasukhasahagataṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya nasukhasahagatena cittena dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:630.7: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.13:630.18: senāsanaṃ sukhaṃ upanissāya nasukhasahagatena cittena dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:630.32: kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā sukhassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:631.1: Nasukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:631.5: nasukhasahagataṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya sukhasahagatena cittena dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:631.7: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.13:631.18: senāsanaṃ sukhaṃ upanissāya sukhasahagatena cittena dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:632.1: Nasukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa ca nasukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:632.5: nasukhasahagataṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya sukhasahagatena cittena dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:632.10: senāsanaṃ sukhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:632.12: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, sukhasahagatena cittena adinnaṃ ādiyati … pe …
patthana2.13:632.20: kāyikassa sukhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā sukhassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:633.1: Sukhasahagato ca nasukhasahagato ca dhammā sukhasahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:635.1: Nasukhasahagato dhammo nasukhasahagatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:635.6: vatthuṃ nasukhasahagatena cittena aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha nasukhasahagato rāgo uppajjati … pe …
patthana2.13:635.10: domanassaṃ uppajjati, sukhaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati … pe …
patthana2.13:635.19: vatthu nasukhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ sukhassa ca purejātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:636.1: Nasukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:636.6: vatthuṃ sukhasahagatena cittena aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha sukhasahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:637.1: Nasukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa ca nasukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:637.6: vatthuṃ sukhasahagatena cittena aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha sukhañca sampayuttakā khandhā ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:637.10: vatthu sukhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ sukhassa ca purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:638.1: Pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.13:640.1: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:640.3: (Cha kammāni cattāri sahajātāpi nānākkhaṇikāpi kātabbā, dve nānākkhaṇikā.)
patthana2.13:640.4: Vipākapaccayena paccayo … nava … āhārapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … indriyapaccayena paccayo … nava … jhānapaccayena paccayo … nava … maggapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … cha … vippayuttapaccayena paccayo … pañca … atthipaccayena paccayo … nava … natthipaccayena paccayo … nava … vigatapaccayena paccayo … nava … avigatapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.13:644.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cha, vipāke nava, āhāre cattāri, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge cattāri, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.13:645.1: (Evaṃ paccanīyavibhaṅgopi gaṇanāpi sappītikadukasadisaṃ kātabbaṃ, yadipi vimati atthi anulomaṃ passitvā gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana2.13:652.1: Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:652.2: upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:652.6: upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:652.7: upekkhāsahagate khandhe paṭicca upekkhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:652.10: Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:652.11: upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā upekkhā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:653.1: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:653.2: naupekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:653.7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe naupekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:653.11: paṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhaṃ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, upekkhaṃ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca upekkhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe ….
patthana2.13:656.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … purejāte cha, āsevane cha, kamme nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.13:660.1: Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:660.2: ahetukaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:660.6: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:660.7: Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:660.8: ahetuke upekkhāsahagate khandhe paṭicca upekkhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:660.11: Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:660.12: ahetukaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā upekkhā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:661.1: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:661.2: ahetukaṃ naupekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:661.9: upekkhaṃ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca upekkhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe ….
patthana2.13:662.1: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:662.5: vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ upekkhaṃ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:663.1: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:663.2: ahetukaṃ upekkhaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, ahetukaṃ upekkhaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:663.3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagatā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca upekkhā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.13:664.1: Upekkhāsahagatañca naupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:664.2: ahetukaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca upekkhañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:664.4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca upekkhañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:664.6: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā;
patthana2.13:664.9: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca upekkhañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:665.1: Upekkhāsahagatañca naupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:665.2: ahetuke upekkhāsahagate khandhe ca upekkhañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, ahetuke upekkhāsahagate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:665.3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagate khandhe ca upekkhañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca upekkhā. #2
patthana2.13:666.1: Upekkhāsahagatañca naupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:666.2: ahetukaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca upekkhañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:666.4: ahetukaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca upekkhañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:666.6: ahetuke upekkhāsahagate khandhe ca upekkhañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:666.7: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca upekkhañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:666.9: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca upekkhañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:666.11: ahetuke upekkhāsahagate khandhe ca upekkhañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:666.12: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā upekkhā ca, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:669.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:671.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:675.1: Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:675.2: upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:675.6: (yathā savitakkadukasadisaṃ paccayavāre nānākaraṇaṃ. “Upekkhan”ti navapi pañhā kātabbā, paṭisandhipavattipi vatthupi.)
patthana2.13:676.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … purejāte nava, āsevane nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.13:678.1: Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:678.2: ahetukaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:678.6: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:678.7: (Evaṃ navapi pañhā pavattipaṭisandhiyo yathā savitakkadukassa evaṃ kātabbā. Tīṇiyeva moho, pavatte vatthupi kātabbā.)
patthana2.13:679.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:685.1: Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:685.2: upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:686.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha (sabbattha cha), avigate cha.
patthana2.13:688.1: Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:688.2: ahetukaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:688.6: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:688.7: (Evaṃ pañca pañhā yathā savitakkaduke evaṃ kātabbā.)
patthana2.13:689.1: Nahetuyā cha, naadhipatiyā cha, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte cha, naāsevane cha, nakamme cattāri, navipāke cha, navippayutte cha.
patthana2.13:692.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:697.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:697.2: upekkhāsahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:698.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:698.3: (Yathā sappītikadukaṃ evaṃ ārammaṇampi adhipatipi vitthāretabbā, “upekkhā”ti nānaṃ.)
patthana2.13:700.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:700.2: purimā purimā upekkhāsahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ upekkhāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:701.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo naupekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:701.2: purimā purimā upekkhāsahagatā khandhā pacchimāya pacchimāya upekkhāya anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:701.10: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ naupekkhāsahagatāya phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:702.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa ca naupekkhāsahagatassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:702.2: purimā purimā upekkhāsahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ upekkhāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ upekkhāya ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:703.1: Naupekkhāsahagato dhammo naupekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:703.2: purimā purimā upekkhā pacchimāya pacchimāya upekkhāya anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:703.3: purimā purimā naupekkhāsahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ naupekkhāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:703.8: Purimā purimā upekkhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ upekkhāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:704.1: Naupekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa ca naupekkhāsahagatassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:704.2: purimā purimā upekkhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ upekkhāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ upekkhāya ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:705.1: Upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:705.2: purimā purimā upekkhāsahagatā khandhā ca upekkhā ca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ upekkhāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:705.4: Purimā purimā upekkhāsahagatā khandhā ca upekkhā ca pacchimāya pacchimāya upekkhāya anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:705.5: upekkhāsahagataṃ cuticittañca upekkhā ca naupekkhāsahagatassa upapatticittassa …
patthana2.13:705.6: āvajjanā ca upekkhā ca naupekkhāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ …
patthana2.13:705.7: vipākamanodhātu ca upekkhā ca naupekkhāsahagatāya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā …
patthana2.13:705.8: upekkhāsahagataṃ bhavaṅgañca upekkhā ca naupekkhāsahagatassa bhavaṅgassa …
patthana2.13:705.9: upekkhāsahagataṃ kusalākusalañca upekkhā ca naupekkhāsahagatassa vuṭṭhānassa …
patthana2.13:705.12: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanañca upekkhā ca naupekkhāsahagatāya phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:705.14: Purimā purimā upekkhāsahagatā khandhā ca upekkhā ca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ upekkhāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ upekkhāya ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:706.1: Samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … nava … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nava … nissayapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.13:708.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:709.1: Naupekkhāsahagato dhammo naupekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:709.5: naupekkhāsahagataṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya naupekkhāsahagatena cittena dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:709.15: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.13:709.29: senāsanaṃ upekkhaṃ upanissāya naupekkhāsahagatena cittena dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:709.36: senāsanaṃ upekkhā ca naupekkhāsahagatāya saddhāya … pe …
patthana2.13:709.44: maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upekkhāya ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:710.1: Naupekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:710.3: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya upekkhāsahagatena cittena dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:710.5: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.13:710.8: senāsanaṃ upekkhaṃ upanissāya upekkhāsahagatena cittena dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:710.10: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, upekkhāsahagatena cittena adinnaṃ ādiyati, musā bhaṇati, pisuṇaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:710.29: senāsanaṃ upekkhā ca upekkhāsahagatāya saddhāya … pe …
patthana2.13:711.1: Naupekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa ca naupekkhāsahagatassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:712.1: Upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:714.1: Naupekkhāsahagato dhammo naupekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:716.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo naupekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … nava … kammapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana2.13:716.7: (Cattāri sahajātā nānākkhaṇikā kātabbā, dve nānākkhaṇikā ca.)
patthana2.13:716.8: Vipākapaccayena paccayo … nava … āhārapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … indriyapaccayena paccayo … nava … jhānapaccayena paccayo … nava … maggapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … cha … vippayuttapaccayena paccayo … pañca … atthipaccayena paccayo … nava … natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:720.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cha, vipāke nava, āhāre cattāri, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge cattāri, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.13:721.1: (Evaṃ paccanīyavibhaṅgopi itare tīṇi gaṇanāpi sappītikadukasadisā kātabbā.)
patthana2.13:728.1: Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:728.2: kāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:728.11: Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:728.13: Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:728.14: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacarā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.13:729.1: Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:729.2: nakāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:729.8: Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:729.11: Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:729.12: nakāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:730.1: Kāmāvacarañca nakāmāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:730.2: nakāmāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:730.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nakāmāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ.
patthana2.13:730.4: Kāmāvacarañca nakāmāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:730.5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nakāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe ….
patthana2.13:730.9: Kāmāvacarañca nakāmāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:730.10: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nakāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:730.14: nakāmāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ.
patthana2.13:733.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte cattāri, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate nava.
patthana2.13:737.1: Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:737.2: ahetukaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:737.8: (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.13:740.1: Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:741.1: Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:741.2: nakāmāvacare khandhe paṭicca nakāmāvacarādhipati, vipākaṃ nakāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:741.8: Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:741.9: vipāke nakāmāvacare khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:741.12: Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:741.13: vipākaṃ nakāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:742.1: Kāmāvacarañca nakāmāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:742.2: vipāke nakāmāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:744.1: Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana2.13:745.2: vipākaṃ nakāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …

patthana2.13:745.13: Vipākaṃ nakāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:749.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:755.1: Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:755.2: kāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:755.8: (yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṃ paccayā kāmāvacarā khandhā.
patthana2.13:755.9: Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:755.13: Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:755.14: vatthuṃ paccayā nakāmāvacarā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:756.1: Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:757.1: Kāmāvacarañca nakāmāvacarañca dhammaṃ paccayā kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (paṭiccasadisā).
patthana2.13:757.2: Kāmāvacarañca nakāmāvacarañca dhammaṃ paccayā nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:757.3: nakāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:757.9: Kāmāvacarañca nakāmāvacarañca dhammaṃ paccayā kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:757.10: nakāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:757.14: nakāmāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:758.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā nava, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte cattāri, āsevane cattāri, kamme nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.13:760.1: Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:760.2: ahetukaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā … pe …
patthana2.13:760.8: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā kāmāvacarā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.13:763.1: Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā … ekaṃ (yāva asaññasattā).
patthana2.13:763.3: Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:763.4: vatthuṃ paccayā nakāmāvacarādhipati, vatthuṃ paccayā vipākā nakāmāvacarā khandhā;
patthana2.13:763.7: Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:763.8: vatthuṃ paccayā vipākā nakāmāvacarā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:764.1: Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:765.1: Kāmāvacarañca nakāmāvacarañca dhammaṃ paccayā kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā (paṭiccasadisā. Mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ.)
patthana2.13:765.3: Nakāmāvacare khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā nakāmāvacarādhipati, vipākaṃ nakāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:765.10: Vipākaṃ nakāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:765.14: vipāke nakāmāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:766.4: (Suddhake arūpamissake ca “vipākan”ti niyāmetabbaṃ, rūpamissake natthi. Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana2.13:768.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:775.1: Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:775.2: kāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:776.1: Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:776.2: nakāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:777.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve (sabbattha dve), avigate dve.
patthana2.13:779.1: Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:779.2: ahetukaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:779.8: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:780.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte dve, naāsevane dve, nakamme dve, navipāke dve, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte dve.
patthana2.13:783.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:788.1: Kāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:788.2: kāmāvacarā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:789.1: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:789.2: nakāmāvacarā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:789.5: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:789.6: nakāmāvacarā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:789.10: Nakāmāvacarā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:791.1: Kāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:791.6: pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:791.18: vatthuṃ kāmāvacare khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:792.1: Kāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:792.2: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena kāmāvacaracittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, kāmāvacarā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:793.1: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:793.3: cetopariyañāṇena nakāmāvacaracittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa … pe …
patthana2.13:793.7: nakāmāvacarā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:794.1: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:794.2: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati … pe …
patthana2.13:794.7: nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:794.8: ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ paccavekkhati, viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ paccavekkhati, ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ paccavekkhati, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ paccavekkhati, dibbaṃ cakkhuṃ paccavekkhati, dibbaṃ sotadhātuṃ paccavekkhati, iddhividhañāṇaṃ paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:794.14: anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ paccavekkhati, nakāmāvacare khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati. #2
patthana2.13:796.1: Kāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:796.10: pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, sekkhā gotrabhuṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, cakkhuṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:796.12: vatthuṃ kāmāvacare khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:796.14: kāmāvacarādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:797.1: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:797.7: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:797.10: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:797.12: nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:797.13: ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:797.17: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, dibbaṃ cakkhuṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:797.23: anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, nakāmāvacare khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:797.26: nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa ca nakāmāvacarassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:797.28: nakāmāvacarādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3

patthana2.13:800.5: paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa jhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … pe …

patthana2.13:801.3: maggo phalassa, phalaṃ phalassa, nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:801.4: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:801.5: nakāmāvacaraṃ cuticittaṃ kāmāvacarassa upapatticittassa, nakāmāvacaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ āvajjanāya, nakāmāvacarā khandhā kāmāvacarassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo …. #2
patthana2.13:802.1: Samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … satta … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … cha … nissayapaccayena paccayo … satta.

patthana2.13:807.5: nakāmāvacaraṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ … pe …

patthana2.13:807.12: paññaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ … pe …

patthana2.13:809.1: Kāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.13:812.1: Kāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.13:813.4: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.13:817.1: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.13:817.8: nakāmāvacarā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:819.1: Kāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:819.4: Kāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:819.7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu nakāmāvacarānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:820.1: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:820.4: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:820.6: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa ca nakāmāvacarassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:821.1: Kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā kāmāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:821.4: nakāmāvacarā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:821.8: nakāmāvacarā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:821.10: nakāmāvacarā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:821.11: Kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:821.14: nakāmāvacaro eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …
patthana2.13:822.1: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:825.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.
patthana2.13:827.1: Kāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:827.9: Kāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:828.1: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:828.4: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:828.9: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa ca nakāmāvacarassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:829.1: Kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā kāmāvacarassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ.
patthana2.13:829.2: Kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. #2
patthana2.13:833.1: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, na sahajāte cha, naaññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha … pe … nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā pañca, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate pañca.
patthana2.13:835.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare cattāri, nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri … pe … nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:837.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri (anulomamātikā kātabbā) … pe … avigate satta.
patthana2.13:844.1: Rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:844.2: rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:844.8: Rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:844.12: Rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro ca narūpāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:844.13: rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:845.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:845.2: narūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:845.10: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:845.12: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro ca narūpāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:845.13: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca rūpāvacarā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.13:846.1: Rūpāvacarañca narūpāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:846.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe ….
patthana2.13:846.6: Rūpāvacarañca narūpāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:846.7: rūpāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:846.8: paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ.
patthana2.13:846.9: Rūpāvacarañca narūpāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro ca narūpāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:846.10: paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:846.14: rūpāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ.
patthana2.13:849.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme nava, vipāke nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte cattāri, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate nava.
patthana2.13:853.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:853.2: ahetukaṃ narūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:853.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:853.10: (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.13:856.1: Rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:856.2: rūpāvacare khandhe paṭicca rūpāvacarādhipati vipākaṃ, rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:856.8: Rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:856.9: vipāke rūpāvacare khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:856.12: Rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro ca narūpāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:856.13: vipākaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:857.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:857.2: narūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:857.7: (Nakāmāvacaraṃ paṭiccavārasadisaṃ ninnānaṃ, idha sabbe mahābhūtā kātabbā.) #3
patthana2.13:858.1: Rūpāvacarañca narūpāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:858.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe ….
patthana2.13:858.6: Rūpāvacarañca narūpāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:858.7: vipāke rūpāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:858.10: Rūpāvacarañca narūpāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro ca narūpāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:858.11: paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:858.15: rūpāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ.
patthana2.13:860.1: Rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.13:860.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.13:860.6: Rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.13:860.10: Rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro ca narūpāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.13:860.11: paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana2.13:861.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.13:861.2: arūpe narūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:861.9: (yāva asaññasattā, itare pañcapi pañhā, anulomaṃ kātabbaṃ) napacchājātapaccayā … nava.
patthana2.13:863.1: Rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—
patthana2.13:863.2: vipākaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:863.8: Rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—
patthana2.13:863.12: Rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro ca narūpāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti naāsevanapaccayā—
patthana2.13:863.13: vipākaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:864.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:865.1: Rūpāvacarañca narūpāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā (Saṃkhittaṃ. Mūlaṃ. Itarepi pañhā kātabbā) …
patthana2.13:866.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—
patthana2.13:866.2: arūpe narūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:869.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:871.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:876.1: Rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:877.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:877.2: narūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:877.6: (yāva ajjhattikaṃ mahābhūtaṃ) vatthuṃ paccayā narūpāvacarā khandhā.
patthana2.13:877.7: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:877.11: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā rūpāvacaro ca narūpāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:877.12: vatthuṃ paccayā rūpāvacarā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:878.1: Rūpāvacarañca narūpāvacarañca dhammaṃ paccayā rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:878.2: rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:878.8: Rūpāvacarañca narūpāvacarañca dhammaṃ paccayā narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:878.9: rūpāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:878.12: Rūpāvacarañca narūpāvacarañca dhammaṃ paccayā rūpāvacaro ca narūpāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:878.13: rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:878.17: rūpāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:881.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā nava, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte cattāri, āsevane cattāri, kamme nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.13:885.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:885.2: ahetukaṃ narūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:885.10: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā narūpāvacarā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:887.1: Rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:888.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
patthana2.13:888.3: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:888.4: vatthuṃ paccayā rūpāvacarādhipati, vatthuṃ paccayā vipākā rūpāvacarā khandhā;
patthana2.13:888.7: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā rūpāvacaro ca narūpāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:888.8: vatthuṃ paccayā vipākā rūpāvacarā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:889.1: Rūpāvacarañca narūpāvacarañca dhammaṃ paccayā rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:889.2: rūpāvacare khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā rūpāvacarādhipati, vipākaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:889.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe ….
patthana2.13:889.10: Rūpāvacarañca narūpāvacarañca dhammaṃ paccayā narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:889.11: vipāke rūpāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:889.14: Rūpāvacarañca narūpāvacarañca dhammaṃ paccayā rūpāvacaro ca narūpāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:889.15: vipākaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:889.19: vipāke rūpāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.13:892.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi … pe … naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava (suddhike arūpe ca missake ca “vipākan”ti niyāmetabbaṃ), nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:898.1: Rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:898.2: rūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:899.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:899.2: narūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:900.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve (sabbattha dve), avigate dve.
patthana2.13:902.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.13:903.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte dve, naāsevane dve, nakamme dve, navipāke dve, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte ekaṃ.
patthana2.13:906.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:911.1: Rūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:911.2: rūpāvacarā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:911.6: Rūpāvacarā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:911.10: Rūpāvacarā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:912.1: Narūpāvacaro dhammo narūpāvacarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:912.2: narūpāvacarā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:914.1: Rūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:914.2: cetopariyañāṇena rūpāvacaracittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, rūpāvacarā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:914.3: Rūpāvacaro dhammo narūpāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:914.6: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ paccavekkhati, dibbaṃ cakkhuṃ paccavekkhati, dibbaṃ sotadhātuṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:914.16: anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ paccavekkhati, rūpāvacare khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati. #2
patthana2.13:915.1: Narūpāvacaro dhammo narūpāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:915.6: pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:915.9: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:915.18: vatthuṃ narūpāvacare khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:916.1: Narūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:916.2: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena narūpāvacaracittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, narūpāvacarā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:918.1: Rūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:918.4: Rūpāvacaro dhammo narūpāvacarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:918.7: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati … pe …
patthana2.13:918.23: anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, rūpāvacare khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:918.26: Rūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa ca narūpāvacarassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:918.28: rūpāvacarādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:919.1: Narūpāvacaro dhammo narūpāvacarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:919.10: pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.13:919.11: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana2.13:919.15: nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:919.18: vatthuṃ narūpāvacare khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.13:919.23: narūpāvacarādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:921.1: Rūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:921.2: purimā purimā rūpāvacarā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:921.3: Rūpāvacaro dhammo narūpāvacarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:921.4: rūpāvacaraṃ cuticittaṃ narūpāvacarassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:921.6: rūpāvacarā khandhā narūpāvacarassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:922.1: Narūpāvacaro dhammo narūpāvacarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:922.2: purimā purimā narūpāvacarā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ narūpāvacarānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:922.6: Narūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:922.7: narūpāvacaraṃ cuticittaṃ rūpāvacarassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:922.8: narūpāvacarā khandhā rūpāvacarassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:922.9: paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa jhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.13:923.1: Samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … satta … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … cha … nissayapaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana2.13:925.1: Rūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:925.5: rūpāvacaraṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya rūpāvacaraṃ jhānaṃ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:925.19: paññāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo, paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ dutiyassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo, dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ tatiyassa jhānassa … pe …
patthana2.13:925.21: tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ catutthassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana2.13:926.5: rūpāvacaraṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ … pe …

patthana2.13:927.16: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.13:927.21: bhojanaṃ, senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.13:928.1: Narūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:928.5: narūpāvacaraṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya rūpāvacaraṃ jhānaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:928.21: paññāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo, paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.13:930.1: Narūpāvacaro dhammo narūpāvacarassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:930.16: Narūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:930.19: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.13:931.1: Pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … dve … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:933.1: Rūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.13:933.8: rūpāvacarā cetanā vipākānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:933.9: Rūpāvacaro dhammo narūpāvacarassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:933.12: rūpāvacarā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:933.17: Rūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa ca narūpāvacarassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:933.20: rūpāvacarā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:933.24: rūpāvacarā cetanā vipākānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:934.1: Narūpāvacaro dhammo narūpāvacarassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:934.4: narūpāvacarā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:934.8: narūpāvacarā cetanā vipākānaṃ narūpāvacarānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo …. #1
patthana2.13:935.1: Vipākapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … āhārapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … indriyapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … jhānapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … maggapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana2.13:937.1: Rūpāvacaro dhammo narūpāvacarassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
