patthana2.13:940.1: Rūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:940.3: Rūpāvacaro dhammo narūpāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:940.5: Rūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa ca narūpāvacarassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:941.1: Narūpāvacaro dhammo narūpāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:941.4: Narūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:941.7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu rūpāvacarānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:941.9: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, vatthu rūpāvacarānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:942.1: Rūpāvacaro ca narūpāvacaro ca dhammā rūpāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:942.4: rūpāvacaro eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …
patthana2.13:942.10: Rūpāvacaro ca narūpāvacaro ca dhammā narūpāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:942.13: rūpāvacarā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:942.17: rūpāvacarā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:942.19: rūpāvacarā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:943.1: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:946.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.
patthana2.13:948.1: Rūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:948.5: Rūpāvacaro dhammo narūpāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:948.10: Rūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa ca narūpāvacarassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:949.1: Narūpāvacaro dhammo narūpāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:949.9: Narūpāvacaro dhammo rūpāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:950.1: Rūpāvacaro ca narūpāvacaro ca dhammā rūpāvacarassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ.
patthana2.13:950.2: Rūpāvacaro ca narūpāvacaro ca dhammā narūpāvacarassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana2.13:954.1: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte cha, naaññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta … pe … nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā pañca, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate pañca.
patthana2.13:956.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri … pe … nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:958.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri (anulomamātikā kātabbā) … pe … avigate satta.
patthana2.13:965.1: Arūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:965.2: arūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …

patthana2.13:965.10: Arūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpāvacaro ca naarūpāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:965.11: arūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3

patthana2.13:966.10: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …. #1

patthana2.13:967.2: arūpāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.

patthana2.13:980.2: arūpe naarūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …

patthana2.13:981.2: arūpāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.

patthana2.13:982.2: vipākaṃ arūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:982.8: Arūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—
patthana2.13:983.1: Naarūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—
patthana2.13:983.2: naarūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.13:984.1: Arūpāvacarañca naarūpāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—
patthana2.13:984.2: arūpāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana2.13:987.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane cattāri, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:989.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:994.1: Arūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā arūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana2.13:995.4: (yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṃ paccayā naarūpāvacarā khandhā.
patthana2.13:995.5: Naarūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā arūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:995.7: Naarūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā arūpāvacaro ca naarūpāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:995.8: vatthuṃ paccayā arūpāvacarā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #3

patthana2.13:996.7: arūpāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.

patthana2.13:1003.6: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā naarūpāvacarā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana2.13:1004.2: arūpāvacare khandhe paccayā arūpāvacarādhipati, vipākaṃ arūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ … pe …

patthana2.13:1005.8: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā naarūpāvacarā khandhā. #1
patthana2.13:1008.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane cattāri, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.

patthana2.13:1014.2: arūpāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …

patthana2.13:1019.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:1024.1: Arūpāvacaro dhammo arūpāvacarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1024.2: arūpāvacarā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:1024.6: Arūpāvacarā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1024.8: Arūpāvacarā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:1025.1: Naarūpāvacaro dhammo naarūpāvacarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1025.2: naarūpāvacarā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:1027.1: Arūpāvacaro dhammo arūpāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1027.4: Arūpāvacaro dhammo naarūpāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1027.9: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ paccavekkhati, arūpāvacare khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:1027.12: cetopariyañāṇena arūpāvacaracittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, arūpāvacarā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:1028.1: Naarūpāvacaro dhammo naarūpāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1028.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:1028.13: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:1028.14: ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese … pe …
patthana2.13:1028.22: domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena naarūpāvacaracittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana2.13:1028.26: naarūpāvacarā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:1030.1: Arūpāvacaro dhammo arūpāvacarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1030.4: Arūpāvacaro dhammo naarūpāvacarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1030.9: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, arūpāvacare khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:1030.13: Arūpāvacarādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:1031.1: Naarūpāvacaro dhammo naarūpāvacarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1031.8: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.13:1031.13: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:1031.15: nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:1031.18: vatthuṃ naarūpāvacare khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.

patthana2.13:1034.6: Naarūpāvacaro dhammo arūpāvacarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.13:1042.1: Pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … dve … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana2.13:1044.5: arūpāvacarā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1044.7: Arūpāvacarā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3

patthana2.13:1047.1: Arūpāvacaro dhammo arūpāvacarassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:1053.7: Arūpāvacaro dhammo arūpāvacarassa ca naarūpāvacarassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.13:1055.4: arūpāvacaro eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe ….
patthana2.13:1055.8: Arūpāvacaro ca naarūpāvacaro ca dhammā naarūpāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1055.11: arūpāvacarā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1055.13: arūpāvacarā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1055.15: arūpāvacarā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:1056.1: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1059.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri, vipāke dve, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.
patthana2.13:1061.1: Arūpāvacaro dhammo arūpāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1061.5: Arūpāvacaro dhammo naarūpāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1061.9: Arūpāvacaro dhammo arūpāvacarassa ca naarūpāvacarassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:1062.1: Naarūpāvacaro dhammo naarūpāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1062.9: Naarūpāvacaro dhammo arūpāvacarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:1063.1: Arūpāvacaro ca naarūpāvacaro ca dhammā arūpāvacarassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ.
patthana2.13:1063.2: Arūpāvacaro ca naarūpāvacaro ca dhammā naarūpāvacarassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana2.13:1067.1: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte satta … pe … nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:1069.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri … pe … nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:1071.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri (anulomamātikā kātabbā) … pe … avigate satta.
patthana2.13:1075.1: Pariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1075.2: pariyāpannaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:1075.8: (Yathā cūḷantaraduke lokiyadukaṃ. Evaṃ imampi dukaṃ kātabbaṃ, ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
patthana2.13:1081.1: Niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1081.2: niyyānikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.13:1081.6: Niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1081.8: Niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca niyyāniko ca aniyyāniko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1081.9: niyyānikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana2.13:1082.1: Aniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1082.2: aniyyānikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:1082.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …. #1
patthana2.13:1083.1: Niyyānikañca aniyyānikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1083.2: niyyānike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.13:1086.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare samanantare dve, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana2.13:1090.1: Aniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1090.2: ahetukaṃ aniyyānikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:1090.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:1090.10: (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:1092.1: Niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:1093.1: Aniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:1093.2: aniyyānikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:1096.1: Niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.13:1096.4: Niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.13:1097.1: Aniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.13:1097.2: arūpe aniyyānikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:1098.1: Niyyānikañca aniyyānikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.13:1098.2: niyyānike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.13:1101.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve, naanantare tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane ekaṃ, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:1103.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:1108.1: Niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:1109.1: Aniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1109.2: aniyyānikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:1109.6: (yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṃ paccayā aniyyānikā khandhā.
patthana2.13:1109.7: Aniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1109.9: Aniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā niyyāniko ca aniyyāniko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1109.10: vatthuṃ paccayā niyyānikā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.13:1110.1: Niyyānikañca aniyyānikañca dhammaṃ paccayā niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1110.2: niyyānikaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe ….
patthana2.13:1110.6: Niyyānikañca aniyyānikañca dhammaṃ paccayā aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1110.7: niyyānike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana2.13:1110.8: Niyyānikañca aniyyānikañca dhammaṃ paccayā niyyāniko ca aniyyāniko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1110.9: niyyānikaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.13:1110.13: niyyānike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.13:1113.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā nava, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cattāri, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte cattāri, āsevane cattāri, kamme nava, vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.13:1117.1: Aniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1117.2: ahetukaṃ aniyyānikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:1117.8: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā aniyyānikā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.13:1119.1: Niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:1120.1: Niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:1121.1: Aniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:1121.6: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā aniyyānikā khandhā.
patthana2.13:1121.7: Aniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:1122.1: Niyyānikañca aniyyānikañca dhammaṃ paccayā niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.13:1122.2: niyyānike khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā niyyānikādhipati. #1
patthana2.13:1125.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare tīṇi … pe … naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane ekaṃ, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:1127.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:1130.1: Niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1130.2: niyyānikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana2.13:1131.1: Aniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1131.2: aniyyānikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:1132.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve (sabbattha dve), vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana2.13:1133.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte dve, naāsevane ekaṃ, nakamme dve, navipāke dve, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte dve.
patthana2.13:1135.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:1140.1: Niyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1140.2: niyyānikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1140.4: Niyyānikā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1140.6: Niyyānikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:1141.1: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1141.2: aniyyānikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:1143.1: Niyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1143.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena niyyānikacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, niyyānikā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:1144.1: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1144.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:1144.13: ariyā phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:1144.22: vatthuṃ aniyyānike khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:1144.25: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena aniyyānikacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa … pe …
patthana2.13:1144.33: aniyyānikā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1145.1: Aniyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1147.1: Niyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1147.4: Niyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1147.7: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.13:1147.11: Niyyānikādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:1148.1: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1148.8: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, pubbe suciṇṇāni … pe …
patthana2.13:1148.12: ariyā phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:1148.15: vatthuṃ aniyyānike khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:1148.17: aniyyānikādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1148.18: Aniyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1150.1: Niyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1151.1: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1151.2: purimā purimā aniyyānikā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ aniyyānikānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:1151.7: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1151.8: Aniyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:1152.1: Samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pañca … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … dve … nissayapaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana2.13:1154.1: Niyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1154.3: paṭhamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.13:1154.5: tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1154.6: Niyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1154.10: ariyā maggaṃ upanissāya anuppannaṃ samāpattiṃ uppādenti, uppannaṃ samāpajjanti, saṅkhāre aniccato … pe …
patthana2.13:1154.14: paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya ṭhānāṭhānakosallassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo, maggo phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:1155.1: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1155.5: aniyyānikaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:1155.34: Aniyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1155.38: paṭhamassa maggassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.13:1155.40: catutthassa maggassa parikammaṃ catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:1157.1: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … dve (arūpadukasadisā kātabbā) …
patthana2.13:1157.3: pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … dve … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana2.13:1159.1: Niyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1159.2: niyyānikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1159.3: Niyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1159.6: niyyānikā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1159.10: Niyyānikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:1160.1: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1160.5: aniyyānikā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo … vipākapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃyeva …
patthana2.13:1160.8: āhārapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … indriyapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … jhānapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … maggapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … dve … vippayuttapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi (arūpadukasadisā kātabbā) …
patthana2.13:1160.20: atthipaccayena paccayo … satta (arūpadukasadisā kātabbā, āmasanā nānāpadāyeva) …
patthana2.13:1160.22: natthipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … vigatapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … avigatapaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana2.13:1163.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate satta.
patthana2.13:1166.1: Niyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1166.3: Niyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1166.7: Niyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa ca aniyyānikassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:1167.1: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1167.9: Aniyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:1168.1: Niyyāniko ca aniyyāniko ca dhammā niyyānikassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ.
patthana2.13:1168.2: Niyyāniko ca aniyyāniko ca dhammā aniyyānikassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana2.13:1172.1: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte satta … pe … nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:1174.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri … pe … nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:1176.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca (anulomamātikā vitthāretabbā) … pe … avigate satta.
patthana2.13:1180.1: Niyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca niyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1180.2: niyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.13:1180.6: Niyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1180.8: (Saṃkhittaṃ. Pañcapi pañhā kātabbā. Yathā niyyānikadukaṃ evaṃ paṭiccavāropi sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi kātabbā, ninnānākaraṇaṃ āmasanaṃ nānaṃ.)
patthana2.13:1185.1: Niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … cattāri.
patthana2.13:1187.1: Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1187.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, niyate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe … pe …
patthana2.13:1187.4: niyate khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, cetopariyañāṇena niyatacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, niyatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:1188.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1188.8: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha aniyato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi … pe …
patthana2.13:1188.14: aniyataṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati, ariyā phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:1188.15: ariyā aniyate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese … pe …
patthana2.13:1188.21: vatthuṃ aniyate khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha aniyato rāgo … pe …
patthana2.13:1188.25: domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati … pe …
patthana2.13:1188.28: Aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:1188.34: yaṃ vatthuṃ āmasantassa micchattaniyatā khandhā uppajjanti, taṃ vatthu micchattaniyatānaṃ khandhānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:1190.1: Niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1190.4: Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1190.7: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.13:1190.10: Niyato dhammo niyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1190.12: niyatādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:1191.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1191.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā aniyato rāgo uppajjati …
patthana2.13:1191.12: ariyā phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:1191.15: vatthuṃ aniyate khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā aniyato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:1191.17: aniyatādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1191.18: Aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1193.1: Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1193.2: maggo phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, niyatā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.13:1194.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1194.2: purimā purimā aniyatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ aniyatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:1194.7: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1194.8: Aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1194.9: aniyataṃ domanassaṃ niyatassa domanassassa, aniyatā micchādiṭṭhi niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:1195.1: Samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pañca … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … dve … nissayapaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana2.13:1197.1: Niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1197.10: tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1197.11: Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1197.17: saṃghaṃ bhinditvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, ariyā maggaṃ upanissāya anuppannaṃ samāpattiṃ uppādenti, uppannaṃ samāpajjanti … pe …
patthana2.13:1198.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1198.5: aniyataṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:1198.7: uposathakammaṃ karoti, jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:1199.1: Aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1199.5: aniyataṃ rāgaṃ upanissāya mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeti … pe …
patthana2.13:1199.10: senāsanaṃ upanissāya mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeti … pe …
patthana2.13:1199.19: paṭhamassa maggassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa maggassa … pe …
patthana2.13:1199.21: catutthassa maggassa parikammaṃ catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:1201.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1201.4: Aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1202.1: Pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … dve … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana2.13:1204.1: Niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1204.2: niyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1204.3: Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1204.6: niyatā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1204.8: niyatā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1204.10: Niyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:1205.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1206.1: Vipākapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ … āhārapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … indriyapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … jhānapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … maggapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … dve … vippayuttapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi (arūpadukasadisaṃ) …
patthana2.13:1206.17: natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana2.13:1209.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre cattāri, indriye jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate satta.
patthana2.13:1211.1: Niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1211.3: Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1211.8: Niyato dhammo niyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:1212.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1212.9: Aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:1213.1: Niyato ca aniyato ca dhammā niyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ.
patthana2.13:1213.2: Niyato ca aniyato ca dhammā aniyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana2.13:1217.1: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte satta … pe … nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:1219.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri … pe … nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:1221.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca (anulomamātikā vitthāretabbā) … pe … avigate satta.
patthana2.13:1225.1: Sauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1225.2: sauttaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:1225.8: (Yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā. Yathā cūḷantaraduke lokiyadukasadisaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
patthana2.13:1231.1: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1231.2: saraṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.13:1232.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana2.13:1234.1: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1234.2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.13:1235.1: Araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1235.2: ahetukaṃ araṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:1236.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:1239.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:1242.1: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1242.2: saraṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.13:1243.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.13:1245.1: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1245.2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.13:1246.1: Araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā araṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1246.2: ahetukaṃ araṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.13:1246.10: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā khandhā.
patthana2.13:1246.11: Araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1247.1: Saraṇañca araṇañca dhammaṃ paccayā saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:1247.2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.13:1248.1: Nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:1251.1: (Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo, saṃsaṭṭhavārepi dve pañhā kātabbā sabbattha.)
patthana2.13:1252.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve (sabbattha dve), vipāke ekaṃ, avigate dve.
patthana2.13:1253.1: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte dve, naāsevane dve, nakamme dve, navipāke dve, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte dve.
patthana2.13:1259.1: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1261.1: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1261.2: rāgaṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi … pe …
patthana2.13:1261.8: domanassaṃ uppajjati, diṭṭhiṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe …
patthana2.13:1261.14: domanassaṃ ārabbha domanassaṃ uppajjati, diṭṭhi … pe …
patthana2.13:1261.19: Saraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1261.26: saraṇe khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, cetopariyañāṇena saraṇacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti.
patthana2.13:1261.29: Saraṇā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:1262.1: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:1262.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe … pe …
patthana2.13:1262.10: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:1262.13: nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1262.16: vatthuṃ araṇe khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati … pe …
patthana2.13:1262.21: Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1262.26: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe …
patthana2.13:1262.34: vatthuṃ, araṇe khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati. #2
patthana2.13:1264.1: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1264.4: rāgaṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati …
patthana2.13:1264.9: Saraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1264.12: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1264.14: saraṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:1265.1: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1265.8: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe … pe …
patthana2.13:1265.12: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:1265.14: nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1265.16: araṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1265.17: Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1265.23: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati …
patthana2.13:1265.31: vatthuṃ, araṇe khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati …
patthana2.13:1267.1: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1267.2: purimā purimā saraṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ saraṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1267.3: Saraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1268.1: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1268.2: purimā purimā araṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ araṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:1268.6: Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1269.1: Samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pañca … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … dve … nissayapaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana2.13:1271.1: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1271.17: Saraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1271.21: rāgaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:1271.23: uposathakammaṃ karoti, jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ … pe …
patthana2.13:1272.1: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1273.1: Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1273.5: saddhaṃ upanissāya mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.13:1275.1: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1275.10: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana2.13:1275.20: Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1275.25: vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.13:1276.1: Pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … dve … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana2.13:1278.1: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1278.2: saraṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1278.6: saraṇā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1278.8: saraṇā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1278.10: Saraṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:1279.1: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1280.1: Vipākapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ … āhārapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … indriyapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … jhānapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … maggapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … dve … vippayuttapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:1282.1: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1282.3: Saraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1282.6: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1283.1: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1283.4: Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1283.8: vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe …
patthana2.13:1283.10: domanassaṃ uppajjati, vatthu saraṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:1284.1: Saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā saraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1284.4: Saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā araṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.13:1284.7: saraṇā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1284.9: saraṇā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1284.11: saraṇā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:1287.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.
patthana2.13:1289.1: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1289.4: Saraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1289.9: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.13:1290.1: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:1290.9: Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.13:1291.1: Saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā saraṇassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ.
patthana2.13:1291.2: Saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā araṇassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana2.13:1295.1: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte satta … pe … nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:1297.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri … pe … nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri … pe … nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:1299.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri (anulomamātikā gahetabbā) … pe … avigate satta.
